description: PNOE is a breath analysis solution for improving users’ general health, lifestyle, and athletic performance, as well as for simplifying regular screening for cardiovascular disease.
Pobre Juan is a renowned Argentinian Steakhouse.
Poke is the first fast-casual concept in Colombia that offers poke bowls, a Hawaiian dish made from sliced, raw fish, vegetables, and sushi rice.
Pollfish is a market research platform offering real-time responses from mobile consumers by delivering surveys through mobile applications.
Porter Group is a remote concierge company that develops a complete solution for remote entrance and access control for condominiums, as well as automation and intelligent storage.
POSRocket provides business owners with an intuitive, user-friendly, cloud-based point-of-sale (POS) platform.
Powerful Brands is a specialty firm dedicated to high-growth consumer health and wellness brands. It partners with entrepreneurs who are bringing unique, bold, and innovative products to market.
Prática manufactures food production equipment, boasting a range of energy-efficient products for restaurants and bakeries to produce quality food without waste.
Prey is an Anti-Theft software for both personal and business use that allows users to track lost and stolen mobile devices and manage them.
Printworks designs, prints and mails individualized print and direct mail marketing solutions for a variety of corporations, non-profits, educational and religious organizations.

Printerous offers individuals and businesses a centralized, online printing platform through which they can submit any and all printing requests for commercial, merchandise, packaging, and photo printing needs.
PrivyID provides digital identity and legally-binding electronic signature technology services in Indonesia.
ProactiveOffice offers clients initiative, project, contract, and indicator management to improve their processes

ProAsist provides technical services such as equipment repair and maintenance for multi-chain stores and industrial facilities in Turkey. With its industry 4.0 smart screen application, clients can monitor their operations instantly, analyze the performance of devices, and manage projects, assets, budgets and processes.
Through its trademark brand, Marina Azul, Procesa Chiapas sells traditional yellow-fin tuna in an innovative, 105-gram flexible pouch.
Prodalysa incorporates stevia into healthy yogurt and milk products.
PropertyFinder is the UAE’s leading real estate and rental marketplace.

Proteus is an information security consulting firm specialized in risk analysis and executive control. It provides network security services to major corporations across Brazil, leveraging a proprietary methodology called Global Security Services (GSS).
Proximie is a SaaS platform for surgeons and medical students to virtually “scrub in” for live surgical guidance, continued learning, and enhanced surgical training.
PSG provides Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) services to US-based staffing companies through its high-quality recruiters in the Philippines.
